lines: 3m dyneon ptfe dispersion tf 5035z, 40 kg (88 lb) drum
the polymer has a density of approximately 2
the spherical hydrophobic polymer particles have an average size of around 200 nm
tf 5035z is used for formulating aqueous non-stick coating systems, which can be used to coat suitably prepared metal, glass and ceramic surfaces and cookware.
3m dyneon ptfe dispersion tf 5035z is a milky-white, water-based fluoropolymer dispersion
the dispersion has a solids content of around 58 percent solids
